name: Kallyx
content:
Kallyx the Piner was a bounty hunter operating during the time leading up to the Clone Wars.
A corrupt Human bounty hunter, Kallyx was known as the Piner, an ancient world meaning "to torture." Taking a bounty on the Jedi Master Tobar Ka-Teen posted by Black Sun, Ka-Teen successfully captured the Ithorian. Torturing him for weeks using knives, Ka-Teen successfully manipulated Kallyx, deceiving her through a complex web of lies. Kallyx's torture ended when a Jedi strike force rescued Ka-Teen.
